  description?: ReactNode;

  headingLevel?: number;
  imageHeight?: number;
  imageUrl?: string;
  imageWidth?: number;

  tertiaryAction?: ReactNode;

}

// @public (undocumented)

  // (undocumented)
  imageHeight?: number;
  // (undocumented)
  imageWidth?: number;
  // (undocumented)
  maxImageHeight?: number;
  // (undocumented)
  maxImageWidth?: number;
}
